name: Hidden Objects: Find them all
description:
Find all the hidden objects in the new puzzle "Hidden Objects: Find them all". Study pictures and develop your concentration, feel like a real detective! Your search skills will be tested like never before!


Game Features:
- Over 250 levels.
- 3 different game modes.
- Original graphics.
- Difficult levels: items are not so easy to detect!
- Free hints.
- Ability to play without the Internet.
- Regular updates.


Try and enjoy!
